title: Drawing, "Study after an Antique Statue of a Seated Woman", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Female figure seated on bench, left hand holds dry bough of tree.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study after an Antique Statue of a Seated Woman", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1363.
